Petamins

Vitamins tailored to your pets

£30 a month

How it works

  • Complete a consultation

    Answer a few questions about your pet's diet, lifestyle and goals, to learn about their health

  • Review the results

    Read your pet's health report and check out the vitamins we've recommended just for them

  • Order your pack

    We'll deliver your customised vitamins in letterbox-friendly packaging to your door every month

Made for your pet

Check out your recommended vitamins, formulated by experts and configured for your individual nutritional needs. Then purchase your personalised vitamin pack and access a world of bespoke content to help you improve your wellbeing.
